CV – Alon Bukai
Personal Details:

Phone: 052-8087947 - Email: alonzorz@gmail.com - Residence: Givat Shmuel

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/alon-bukai-90366b95
Website: http://www.alonbukai.com - GitHub: https://github.com/Alonski/
Prominent Virtues:
· Highly motivated and ambitious to work hard and produce results.
· A Team Player that will do what is required to achieve success for the team and the company.
· Quick learner of new technologies; successful working in both team and self-directed settings.
· Able to work in large teams and manage teams of workers.

· Excellent communication skills.
Education:
· Afeka Engineering College – Software Engineering night-time student starting second year.
· 10x.org.il: May 2016 – Full Stack Training: Python, Django, Javascript, Angular, Git & GitHub.
· Ort Hermelin College: 2009-2011 – Practical Mechatronics Engineer. Graduation with Honors.
· Maagan Michal HS: May 2009 – Computer Science and Physics
Experience and Knowledge:

· Work experience building websites: HTML5, SASS, Modern JavaScript (ES6/7)
· Work experience with backend languages: C#, Node.js, PHP
· Practical experience with blockchain technologies: Solidity, Ethereum, Dapps
· Work experience using Version Control Systems: Git, Github, SVN, Bitbucket
· Work experience in object-oriented programming: developing, testing and debugging code
· Work experience building web apps: Ember and React
· Work experience working with databases: MySQL, Couchbase, MongoDB
· Practical experience building Android Apps: React Native, Java, Android Studio
· Work experience working with Microsoft Office: Word, Excel, PowerPoint.
· Practical experience in Internet Marketing/SEO: Google AdWords/AdSense, Facebook Ads
· Experience with IDEs: Visual Studio, VSCode, Eclipse, IntelliJ, PyCharm
· Knowledge working in both Windows and Linux operating systems.
Employment:

· Full Stack Software Engineer – Part of the Backend team. Responsible for implementing new features and in charge of many critical sections of the backend and frontend. 
· Field Officer in IDF – Managed teams of up 15 people ranging from 18yo to 45yo. Led Missions under stress and time restraints with high success. Finished as First Lieutenant
· Web Developer for Ten-Gas Online – PHP Programmer and product manager for an e-commerce site with thousands of products, focusing on a user-friendly experience and performance. Build over the years using WordPress, WooCommece, PrestaShop and Shopify.
· Web Developer for S-Law Lawyer – PHP CMS System built for a Lawyer in Israel. Designed for Internationalization in Hebrew and English. 
· Programmer for Magen David Adom – ActionScript 3/Flash interaction learning systems for new medics. Worked in a team with Managers and Designers. Worked remotely.
Languages:

· English – Native. Grew up in the Silicon Valley in California.
· Hebrew – Native. Born in Israel. Living in Israel since my late teens.
Projects:

· CoinPanion: Send Ethereum and other tokens to family, friends, artists and merchants by subscription. The ultimate blockchain subscription solution. Frontend: React + Firebase, Smart Contract: Solidity. Won prize for Most Potential in hackathon. https://github.com/Alonski/CoinPanion
· Smart House EEG: Home Automation System using Brain Control (Designed for ALS Patients). Uses PLCBus, IR Transceivers, RFID + RF Sensors. Frontend: C#. Backend: Java.
· Demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UJ-mkT6qw9Y
· More Projects on GitHub: https://github.com/Alonski/

· Strong understanding in Salesforce Administration & Customization, Data Validation, Sales,  Marketing, Customer service & support development team 
· Ability to pick up any domain knowledge faster.
· Strong ability to learn new technologies and system quickly.
· Proficient at handling the tasks independently with minimal guidance.

M.TECH THESIS (2012-2014)                    			Supervisor: Mrs. Prabhpreet Kaur, GNDU Amritsar   
Title: Portability and Secure data Migration among Storage Cloud Provider    
Secure Data Migration among Cloud Providers is an application, in which is user can move their important and private
data from one cloud provider to another more securely especially economy.  CloudSim is used to create the environment 
 of VMs, Datacenters, Broker’s and task Schedulers in which data moves form one provider to another. An Algorithm
“SLA Violation Compensation” has been proposed, in case of provider violates or incapable of providing the required
services to users. In which Provider has to pay or compensate for loss of their important services.

B.T ECH Project (2009-2010):                                           		Supervisor: Jeswinder Singh, NIIT Ludhiana
Title: MyTalk Chat server	
 The MyTalk Chat server is prepared in Core Java through which can many clients can connect to server and broad
cast their messages to all. The chat server uses the concept networking using Port numbers, ServerSocket/Socket
classes, Threads, File I/O Streams and Exception Handling. MyTalk provides the graphical interface using the swing
packages and event handlers.

Project #2 : Customer Attrition Analysis
Client                                   :   CIMB Bank, Malaysia
Problem Statement             :  Analysis and prediction of Customer's Attrition

Description:  CIMB is a Malaysian universal Bank Headquartered in Kuala Lumpur and operating in high growth economies in ASEAN (Associates of South East Asian Nations) currently, commercial banks are facing triple tremendous pressure, including financial disintermediation, interest rate marketization and Internet finance. Meanwhile, increasing financial consumption demand of customers further intensifies the competition among commercial banks. To increase their profits for continuing operations and enhance the core competitiveness, commercial banks must avoid the loss of customers while acquiring new customers. This project discusses commercial bank customer churn prediction based on Different models, and uses random sampling method to improve model, considering the imbalance characteristics of customer data sets. The results shows effectively that enhanced the prediction accuracy of the selected model.
Roles & Responsibilities:
· Took the help from domain experts in identifying the critical behavioral factors which effects the customer attrition 
· Performed Preprocessing of the data using EDA  like Null value and  Outlier treatment
Performance metrics and Hyperparameter tuning and calculated the weights of linear equation to describe the relationship between the explanatory variable and the target variable to predict the responses of new explanatory variables
· Used the pair plot function from the seaborn library for creating the scatter plot matrix to visualize the pair-wise correlations between the different features.
· Performed feature Selection to get important variables
· performing on different models with our data set ,RF give the best accuracy ,we validate the model using Confusion Matrix, ROC-AUC Curve
Platforms & Skills used : Python, Statistics ,EDA, Logistic Regression, SVM ,Decision Tree, Random Forest ,PCA
